text: The Order of the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago is the highest honour of Trinidad and Tobago. Established in 2008, it replaced the Trinity Cross as the decoration for distinguished and outstanding service to the country. ==Recipients== ==References== ==External links== *ORDER OF THE REPUBLIC OF TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO *Office of the President » National Awards Ceremony » Events And Ceremonies » About The Awards *2011 Trinidad & Tobago National Awardees Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Trinidad and Tobago Category:Awards established in 2008 Category:2008 establishments in Trinidad and Tobago
title: Order of the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago
